special_attacks: +1 on attack rolls against goblinoid and orc humanoids, sneak attack +3d6
other_gear: +1 studded leather, +1 light crossbow with 20 bolts, masterwork short sword, climber's kit, 308 gp
feats: Point-Blank Shot, Precise Shot, Rapid Reload, Rapid Shot, Weapon Focus (light crossbow)

sections.body:
Before Combat The rogue prefers to find an elevated spot so she can shoot opponents while they waste time climbing to her.

During Combat The rogue uses Rapid Shot, making the most of Point Blank Shot and her darkvision.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: The cave stalker is an experienced spelunker and treasure hunter.

sections.url: pfsrd://NPC Codex/Rules/Core Class NPCs/Rogue/Rogues/Cave Stalker/Galeth Redbeard

sections.body: Galeth is dour, even for a dwarf, and rarely speaks unless questioned.
Galeth might be a solitary hunter, the lead member of an underground army, or part of a unit of guards wielding crossbows.
Galeth could be discovered barely alive, stuck in a dungeon trap.

sections.name: Galeth Redbeard

defensive_abilities: defensive training (+4 dodge bonus to AC vs. giants), evasion, trap sense +2, uncanny dodge
special_qualities: rogue talents (combat trick, resiliency, weapon training), trapfinding +3
name: Cave Stalker
skills: Acrobatics +12 (+8 when jumping), Climb +12, Escape Artist +12, Knowledge (dungeoneering) +9, Perception +11 (+13 to notice unusual stonework), Stealth +12, Survival +8, Swim +10
will: +4; +2 vs. poison, spells, and spell-like abilities
combat_gear: potion of cure moderate wounds, potions  of spider climb (2), alchemist's fire (2)
